homePage.improving: Повышайте доходы и удерживайте клиентов с нашими цифровыми картами для электронных кошельков, обеспечивая безопасность, удобство и стабильный рост вашего бизнеса.
homePage.memberTypeDesc: Улучшите удержание клиентов с помощью данной карты. Может включать скидки, а также ряд льгот для клиентов. Популярен среди продуктов питания и напитков.
homePage.couponTypeDesc: Увеличьте свой доход, привлекая новых и существующих клиентов с помощью цифровых купонов. Легко рассылать на мессенджеры, размещать посты в социальных сетях и рекомендовать в магазине. Очень популярен в розничной торговле.
homePage.stampTypeDesc: Мотивируйте ваших клиентов на постоянное использование вашего продукта или сервиса. Популярен в кофейнях и индустрии красоты.
homePage.giftCardTypeDesc: Создавайте цифровые подарочные карты. Эти подарочные сертификаты можно приобрести как в магазине, так и онлайн. Их можно подарить с помощью QR-кода или отправив ссылку.
homePage.subscriptionTypeDesc: Продавайте пакет ваших услуг. Легко отслеживайте сколько услуг было использовано. Популярен среди фитнес-служб.
homePage.discountTypeDesc: Создавайте цифровые дисконтные карты для вашего клиента. Доступны системы уровней, которые могут быть сконфигурованы для повышения уровня/размера скидки в зависимости суммы, потраченной клиентом.
homePage.cashbackTypeDesc: Используйте карту при оплате и начисляйте часть суммы обратно на свой счет своим клиентам. Отличное решение для мотивации клиентов на повторные покупки.
homePage.titleCustomise: Выбирайте механизмы лояльности, соответствующие потребностям и целям вашего бизнеса. Полный контроль над дизайном и внешним видом в соответствии с фирменным стилем вашего бренда. Простая в использовании панель управления для создания ваших карточек и управления ими
homePage.titleCommunicate: Привлекайте новых и удерживайте существующих клиентов с помощью цифровых купонных карточек. Легко распространяйте эти карточки с помощью кампаний по электронной почте, постов в социальных сетях и рекомендаций в магазинах. Цифровые купонные карточки особенно популярны в сфере розничной торговли и могут помочь увеличить ваш доход на 49%.
homePage.titleEngare: Держите своих клиентов в курсе событий и знакомьте их с вашими последними предложениями, когда они находятся поблизости. До 10 мест на карточке, полностью настраиваемые сообщения и автоматический режим.
homePage.titleKnow: Расширяйте базу данных клиентов, собирая данные с помощью пользовательских форм регистрации для ваших цифровых карт лояльности. Отслеживайте поведение клиентов, создавайте сегменты и целевые маркетинговые кампании.

homePage.fourthFeedback:
The Geo-Tag feature from Recardme
                                            has truly been a game-changer for my
                                            shop. Located downtown, my business
                                            often relies on foot traffic from

homePage.fifthFeedback:
Recardme has had a significant

                                            during non-peak hours. By offering

                                            we've seen an increase in customer

                                            Additionally, our coffee bean sales

                                            roast. Overall, Recardme has been a
                                            valuable asset to our business.
homePage.sixthFeedback:
We were on the verge of closing on
                                            Sundays due to consistently low

                                            oyster coupons on social media

                                            drastic improvement in business on
                                            Sundays. In fact, we are now
                                            frequently fully booked on what used
                                            to be our slowest day of the week.
                                            Recardme has been a lifesaver for
                                            our Sunday sales.
homePage.seventhFeedback:

                                            experience. I also appreciate the
                                            ability to include useful links
                                            about exercise and nutrition on the
                                            back of the cards. Recardme has been
                                            a valuable tool for my business.

homePage.improving: Increase revenues and improve customer retention with our digital cards for electronic wallets, ensuring security, convenience, and stable business growth.
homePage.memberTypeDesc:
Improve your Customer Retention with Member
 Cards. Can include Discounts as well as a
 number of Customer Perks. Popular with Food
 & Beverage.
homePage.couponTypeDesc:
Increase your revenue by attracting new and
 existing customers via Digital Coupon Cards.
 Easy to send out by e-mail campaigns, post
 on Social Media and recommend in-store. Very
 Popular with Retail.
homePage.stampTypeDesc:
Select a Stamp amount in order to Reward
 Your Customers for each Purchase. Automatic
 Triggers can be set to remind Customers how
 close they are to a reward after a certain
 time period. Extremely popular with Coffee
 Shops and the Beauty Industry.
homePage.giftCardTypeDesc:
Create Digital Gift Cards with variable
 nominal amounts in your preferred currency.
 These Gift Cards can be bought both in-store
 and online. Can be gifted via QR-code or by
 sending a link. Remaining Balance is updated
 via our Scanner upon check-out.
homePage.subscriptionTypeDesc:
Sell Services in Bulk to your Customers and
 easily keep track of how much has been
 claimed. Can be made expirable. Popular with
 Sports/Fitness Services.
homePage.discountTypeDesc:
Create Digital Discount Cards for your
 Customers. Tier Systems are available and
 may be configured to upgrade the
 Tier/Discount Size depending on the
 transaction count or amount spent by the
 customer.
homePage.cashbackTypeDesc:
Set Cashback Rates for your Products and
 Refund your Customers with Balances to their
 Digital Cards upon Checkout. The Balance is
 Updated by Scanning the QR-code and
 Confirming their Purchase Amount and
 Cashback Rate.
homePage.titleCustomise: Choose Loyalty mechanics that match your business needs and goals. Full control over design and appearance to match your brand identity. Easy-to-use dashboard to create and manage your cards
homePage.titleCommunicate: Attract new and retain existing customers with digital coupon cards. Easily distribute these cards through email campaigns, social media posts, and in-store recommendations. Digital coupon cards are especially popular in the retail industry and can help increase your revenue up to 49%.
homePage.titleEngare: Keep your customers in the loop and engage them with your latest offers when they are nearby. Up to 10 locations per card, fully customizable messages and automatic.
homePage.titleKnow: Grow your Customer Database by collecting data with custom enrollment forms for your digital loyalty cards. Track customer behaviors, create segments and targeted marketing campaigns.
homePage.firstFeedback: Recardme has made an instant and significant impact on our business, leading to a 300% surge in newly issued cashback cards. The option for customers to register their cards directly on their phones, instead of filling out a form at the store, has streamlined the process, making it more convenient for both our employees and customers. We find Recardme to be smooth and intuitive, and we're extremely pleased with the results we've witnessed thus far.
homePage.secondFeedback: We've experienced a 70% boost in wine delivery orders and a 20% increase in the average check size since introducing a system to educate our customers about our selection and remind them to place orders through push notifications. This technology has truly transformed our business, and we can't help but wish we had it during the COVID-19 pandemic. Keep up the excellent work!
homePage.thirdFeedback: The push notification feature has proven to be incredibly useful in filling up empty time slots. The fact that I no longer have to print stamp cards is a significant plus. Overall, it's a fantastic tool for my business.
homePage.fourthFeedback: The Geo-Tag feature from Recardme has unquestionably revolutionized my shop. Situated downtown, my business frequently depends on foot traffic from individuals running daily errands and attending meetings in the area. With the Geo-Tag feature, I can remind these customers about my shop and the current Flavor of the Day as they pass by. Thank you, Recardme, for this innovative solution!
